original_title: Finding the Truth: The Making of 'Kramer vs. Kramer'
overview: A behind-the-scenes look at this Oscar-winning classic about a man who finds himself a single parent after his wife walks out on him, then is forced to fight for custody of his child in court. Includes interviews with the stars of the film, including Dustin Hoffman and Meryl Streep, giving their views of what it was like to make this picture.
title: Finding the Truth: The Making of 'Kramer vs. Kramer'
